executiveSummary: Entrepreneur Paige Hansen pitched her company BAM Buckwheat Milk, seeking $250,000 for 10% equity. She highlighted buckwheatâ€™s environmental benefits and her mission to combat soil depletion through sustainable farming. Despite positive remarks about her mission and presentation, all Sharks declined to invest, mainly due to taste preferences, early business stage, and limited sales traction.
nextSteps: Paige plans to continue growing BAM Buckwheat Milk, focusing on her upcoming major retailer launch expected to reduce production costs by 60% and increase market exposure.
